content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module provides helpful new hire information.  Access is provided prior to your start date for your convenience, but review is voluntary, and all content will remain available after you begin your employment. \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":415310,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0d504d9b-7a8b-4a86-8611-3aec33e0822d/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0d504d9b-7a8b-4a86-8611-3aec33e0822d/first day.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"first day.PNG\",\"name\":\"first day.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0d504d9b-7a8b-4a86-8611-3aec33e0822d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":881,\"height\":285},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Earlier you've received the invitation to fill out documents via DOCS platform. In the platform you will be able to fill out all required onboarding documents before your start date.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you will fill out documents please wait for verification from HR contacts and then employment contract preparation. When it will be ready you will get \\\"Welcome to EPAM\\\" email, so you already know where and at what time your first EPAM day begins. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.\\tIt starts at EPAM office where you'll be invited  for your first onboarding da (office or remote).\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.\\tDuring the onboarding you'll meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"HR contacts \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"from People Management Team - who's aim is to help you integrate into EPAM and provide you informational support during the probation period. You'll have a brief introduction to EPAM, it's internal tools, rules and will be proposed to have a short office tour. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.\\tFinal step for your first day is to meet your \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Resource Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and team. Check your working place, get acquainted with your first tasks and enjoy being part of global EPAM team.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
